algorithm_technique: Repeatedly take modulo and divide by base k to extract digits and sum them.
problem_summary_simple: Convert a base-10 number to base-k and sum its digits.
problem_summary_technical: Use modulo and division operations to extract digits in base k and accumulate their sum.
key_insights: The standard algorithm for base conversion involves repeatedly taking the remainder (digit) and dividing by the base.
The sum of digits in any base is simply the sum of these remainders.
The constraints on n and k are small, making this a straightforward arithmetic problem.
